title: Evidence-Based Instructional Design Process for Enhancing Information Problem-Solving (IPS) Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: IPS competency development program applicable to social studies classes for pre- and in-service teachers, emphasizing smartphone-based accessibility and project-based assessment design.

learning_goals: Learners can apply systematic problem-solving steps for information-based tasks in social studies contexts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can design iterative learning activities aligned with curricula, achieving a peer evaluation score of 4/5 or higher.
Learners can apply certification information evaluation and utilization strategies tailored to their proficiency level in project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
